last_episode_to_air.name: Integration
last_episode_to_air.overview: Struggling to recover from betrayal, Iris is willing to take a radical leap once again. Iris needs to confront one more person before making a fateful decision: Emcee.

name: The Girlfriend Experience
overview: Explore the relationships between exclusive escorts and their clients, for whom they provide far more than just sex. Known as GFEs, they are women who provide “The Girlfriend Experience”—emotional and sexual relationships at a very high price.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Season one is the story of Christine Reade, a second year student at Chicago-Burnham Law School and a new intern at the prestigious firm of Kirkland & Allen. Working hard to establish herself at the firm, her focus quickly shifts when a classmate introduces her to the world of transactional relationships. Known as GFEs, they are women who provide The Girlfriend Experience - emotional and sexual relationships at a very high price. Juggling two very different lives, Christine quickly finds herself drawn into the GFE world, attracted to the rush of control and intimacy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two follows two parallel storylines; one centering on the complicated relationship between Erica & Anna during the corrupt political climate of midterm elections, and the other on Bria, a former GFE provider forced to start a new life in New Mexico but lured by the ghosts of her past.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Set in the London tech scene, Season three is the story of Iris, a neuroscience major. As she begins to explore the transactional world of The Girlfriend Experience, Iris quickly learns that her client sessions provide her with a compelling edge in the tech world and vice versa. She then begins to question whether her actions are driven by free will, or something else altogether, and heads down a deep path of exploration.

episodes.name: Entry
episodes.overview: A Chicago law-school student's life takes a dramatic turn when a classmate introduces her to the world of transactional relationships.

episodes.name: A Friend
episodes.overview: Christine's double life begins, as she balances her pursuit of a legal career with her work as a girlfriend experience.

episodes.name: Retention
episodes.overview: Christine confronts Jacqueline over the level of her control; David needs Erin's help to retain one of the firm's major clients.

episodes.name: Crossing the Line
episodes.overview: Christine juggles the demands of law school, her internship and her expanding list of GFE clients; Christine observes trouble among the Kirkland partners at David's annual party.

episodes.name: Insurance
episodes.overview: Christine's secret identity is compromised following the death of one of her clients.

episodes.name: Boundaries
episodes.overview: Christine's growing intimacy with a new client threatens to cross business boundaries; David is confirmed as managing partner at Kirkland & Allen.

episodes.name: Access
episodes.overview: Christine attempts to prevent any further intrusions from Jack, but encounters another problem from an unexpected source.

episodes.name: Provocation
episodes.overview: Christine goes on the attack at Kirkland, intent on achieving revenge.

episodes.name: Blindsided
episodes.overview: Christine's worlds collide, forcing her to devise a way to come out on top.

episodes.name: Available
episodes.overview: Christine embraces her career as a GFE provider following her humiliating experience at Kirkland.

episodes.name: Fabrication
episodes.overview: Christine goes on the counter-attack, in an attempt to force a settlement with Kirkland & Allen, while exploring more anonymous ways to service her GFE clients.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Christine travels home for her parent's 30th wedding anniversary party. They are partially happy to see her.

episodes.name: Separation
episodes.overview: Christine is in complete control.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Season one is the story of Christine Reade, a second year student at Chicago-Burnham Law School and a new intern at the prestigious firm of Kirkland & Allen. Working hard to establish herself at the firm, her focus quickly shifts when a classmate introduces her to the world of transactional relationships. Known as GFEs, they are women who provide The Girlfriend Experience - emotional and sexual relationships at a very high price. Juggling two very different lives, Christine quickly finds herself drawn into the GFE world, attracted to the rush of control and intimacy.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Leverage
episodes.overview: Erica Myles, the finance director at Right To Action, a Republican super PAC, enlists the help of an escort, Anna Garner, in an attempt to gain access to a secret, dark money donor network.

episodes.name: Bria: Admitting
episodes.overview: Bria Jones, a former GFE, enters the witness protection program in order to escape an abusive relationship. When she is relocated to a small town in New Mexico, she finds the GFE world beckoning her once again.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: The List
episodes.overview: Anna delivers a piece of incriminating evidence against Novak, while her relationship with Erica becomes personal. Erica is contacted by a powerful financier.

episodes.name: Bria: Eggshells
episodes.overview: Despite orders to lay low, Bria meets a new client, triggering Ian's suspicions.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Solicitation
episodes.overview: Erica lands her biggest donor yet while Anna and Erica's relationship intensifies.

episodes.name: Bria: Negotiation
episodes.overview: Bria expands the boundaries of the GFE in order to have her needs met.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Donors
episodes.overview: Erica gets a suspicious call from a representative of a secretive potential donor. Anna subjugates herself to Erica's sexual desires and makes a startling decision to solidify their personal relationship.

episodes.name: Bria: Moral Inventory
episodes.overview: With an impending trial date, Ian attempts to reign in Bria by stepping up his surveillance of her.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Family
episodes.overview: Anna breaks some big news to Erica and Erica begins to feel increasing pressure at work.

episodes.name: Bria: Living Like a Tornado
episodes.overview: Bria takes matters into her own hands in order to escape Ian.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Citizens First
episodes.overview: After her rejection from Erica, Anna looks for answers while Erica's life takes unexpected turns, with potentially devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Bria: Making Amends
episodes.overview: The day of the trial has arrived, and Bria must reckon with facing Donald head-on.

episodes.name: Erica & Anna: Free Fall
episodes.overview: Erica tries to escape the consequences of her professional and personal decisions as she falls into a downward spiral, while Anna finds herself back at the top of her game.

episodes.name: Bria: Relapse
episodes.overview: Pursued by both the law and Donald, Bria is forced to take matters into her own hands.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two follows two parallel storylines; one centering on the complicated relationship between Erica & Anna during the corrupt political climate of midterm elections, and the other on Bria, a former GFE provider forced to start a new life in New Mexico but lured by the ghosts of her past.

episodes.name: Mirrors
episodes.overview: Iris relocates to London, leaving behind family and a half-finished degree. She begins a double life: working at an elusive tech startup while providing the girlfriend experience at night.

episodes.name: Everyone's Got a Price
episodes.overview: Iris and her co-worker start working on an AI project that mirrors human emotion. Meanwhile, new clients provided by a high-end escort agency, leave Iris with a wealth of behavioral data.

episodes.name: Deepfake
episodes.overview: Iris gets better at simulating the perfect girlfriend experience for her clients. Simultaneously at NGM, Iris and her co-workers start training the AI model with new simulated sets.

episodes.name: Shuffle
episodes.overview: Iris' client relationships seem increasingly uncanny, and advice from Tawny isn't what Iris was hoping for. Her father's illness catches up with Iris in undeniable ways.

episodes.name: Control Shift
episodes.overview: Iris can't keep her two worlds separate anymore, which comes with unwanted consequences. Iris realizes she's in a position of power, while simultaneously having lost all control.

episodes.name: The Embrace
episodes.overview: Buying time, Iris escapes the messy leftovers of her double life and takes time off-grid. Georges, a former client, takes Iris into his world. Reality, however, has a way of catching up.

episodes.name: Black Box
episodes.overview: Cassie is back with a vengeance, taking her work to the next level. Iris' secrecy around the project puts a dent in her relationship with Hiram and their collaboration around Emcee.

episodes.name: A Set of Lies Agreed Upon
episodes.overview: Having family in town brings up complicated feelings for Iris. Tawny feels bad about how things played out with The V. Afraid to face her own truth, Iris realizes she needs to switch gears.

episodes.name: State of Mind
episodes.overview: Having lost all sense of perspective, Iris confides in Christophe, who, in turn, opens up a part of his world. Little does Iris know the encounter will leave her shaken to the core.

episodes.name: Integration
episodes.overview: Struggling to recover from betrayal, Iris is willing to take a radical leap once again. Iris needs to confront one more person before making a fateful decision: Emcee.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Set in the London tech scene, Season three is the story of Iris, a neuroscience major. As she begins to explore the transactional world of The Girlfriend Experience, Iris quickly learns that her client sessions provide her with a compelling edge in the tech world and vice versa. She then begins to question whether her actions are driven by free will, or something else altogether, and heads down a deep path of exploration.
